name: Hitler Assassination
description:
This is an interaction fiction game that I created for IMS445 at Miami University. The game was created using Twine. 

The year is 1940 and Hitler is attending a party at his top SS officer’s mansion. A group of rebels  within the German society decided that they had to take it upon themselves to assassinate Hitler  in order to secure the allies win in the war. A General, a caterer, and a handful of intelligence  officers under Hitler’s regime decided to take action at this party. The General Richard Ruoff and  caterer Joshua Dorma would enter the party and find a way to take Hitler out...no matter the cost.  

Choose to play as the General or the caterer and carve your path to Hitler and assassinate him.
